title: Cinematic Music and Battle Loops
description: A great quality melodic cinematic music from experienced composer
longDescription:
A great quality melodic cinematic and battle music from Marcin Klosowski.

Listen Demo here: https://soundcloud.com/marcin-k-osik/sets/cinematic-music-and-battle-loops 

Package includes 6 great quality mastered tracks + 1 bonus trailer music. 3 of them are full cinematic tracks with melody and atmosphere, perfect for menus or gameplay and additional 3 are looped for action/battle theme, no simple instruments, no simple 1 layered pads, just pure music from skilled composer promoted on huge youtube channels like "Epic Music World" and "Premium Music HQ" All songs are available in WAV format.


Don't miss my other package with Cinematic Music of the Universe:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/cinematic-music-of-the-universe


Feel free to contact me for help/edits or custom music or sounds via email: quosik@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Wavs: 7

Number of Audio Cues: 7

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes (3 tracks)

Minutes of audio provided: 14

Supported Development Platforms: All
